subject: Re: jigdo and templates for businesscard and netinst?
body:
Will Sarka (willis.sarka@gmail.com) wrote on 9 April 2007 13:20:
 >I have the rest of the ISOs on the mirror, cudlug.cudenver.edu.  Could
 >someone kindly point me in the direction of the jidgo and template files
 >for the businesscard and netinst ISOs?

They're not in the master archive. I guess it's because they're not
worth the effort, since these images are much smaller than a full size CD.


--
